title: Chris Ware
description: In this audio interview with Debbie Millman, Chris Ware discusses his influences – including sending a Valentine to Charlie Brown – and explains why empathy figures so heavily into his work.
itunes:subtitle: In this audio interview with Debbie Millman, Chris Ware discusses his  influences – including sending a Valentine to Charlie Brown – and explains why  empathy figures so heavily into his work.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
